recipe.title: Greek Salad
recipe.comment: you can replace spring onions with a red onion. However, this will no longer be FODMAP friendly.

part.title: Main
part.ingredient: 2 Lebanese cucumbers peeled, de-seeded and chopped
part.step: Place all ingredients in a bowl, except dressing ingredients and stir well. Place dressing ingredients in a small jar and shake well. Pour contents of dressing over salad and mix to combine. Best served immediately.

part.title: Dressing
part.step: Place all ingredients in a bowl, except dressing ingredients and stir well. Place dressing ingredients in a small jar and shake well. Pour contents of dressing over salad and mix to combine. Best served immediately. Ps if you prefer you can replace spring onions with a red onion ( However, this will no longer be FODMAP friendly.)
